pages.header: Welcome to the Achievement Book Demo
pages.description: This book is only here to show you the capabilities of this mod
You can define texts, headers and achievements in the config/achievementbooks folder

pages.achievement: Check out the demo config file for the Achievement Books Mod
Craft the Achievement Book Demo book
Add a new achievement to the Achievement Book Demo
Create another achievement book next to the Achievement Book Demo
Change the wording of achievement id 4 in the Achievement Book Demo
Reorder the achievements on page 2 of the Achievement Book Demo
